member.name: ISpatialInteractionManagerInterop.GetForWindow
member.summary: Retrieves a SpatialInteractionManager object bound to the active application.
member.param: Handle to the window of the active application.
The GUID of the SpatialInteractionManager object.
Address of a pointer to a SpatialInteractionManager object.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISpatialInteractionManagerInterop
member.summary: Enables interoperability with a Universal Windows Platform (UWP) SpatialInteractionManager object, and provides access to SpatialInteractionManager members for accessing user input from hands, motion controllers, and system voice commands.
